title: Я вернусь за тобой
overview: Everything is good in Sergei's life - he is successful in the construction business, is dating a beautiful girl Leroy and plans to buy an apartment in Moscow. However, the past does not let him go - he constantly remembers his first love. Alina's life ended tragically right before the wedding - the girl was hit by a car, and her father, who was against the marriage, told Sergei that it was not possible to save her.
